column1: hei ke enwa opshatla lemati laka ka mona
hei wena ska pshatla lemati laka helang
ha kekena motho enwa otlabona kesekefihla mona
hei ntho esothehileng molomo ke eo
litlhare ake ubone dintho tsee tsedintso moo
litlhare utlonqala ka buka eo yaka
litlhare ee wena uitatela bese efe
litlhare utladiela ntho ya mme mamello
ngwana mang ke enwa ailopalama beseng
kekhathetse hobapala dintho tsena tsa dibuka
batho ba mona badieha hotla kwano
litlhare ke ena mono osheba hodimo mona
litlhare uotlelang ntho ee ya batho
litlhare uotla ntho ya batho ka lejwe
litlhare untseuotla ntho ee ya batho
ubatla hotlapshatla ntho ee ya batho
litlhare upshatla ntho ya ausi mamello ka koloi
litlhare tlisa ntho ena ya batho helang
ketlapshatla dithotsela tsena ka koto ena
hei litlhare ke motho yatlang le peterole eo
keetsela peterole koloi ya ntate litlhare
litlhare uskanabula fesetere ena ya batho
litlhare udiketsa ntate enwa wa ka
ngwana enwa ontswara ka leoto lena
